divs: Sighting DetailsTHE UFO SIGHTING IS STILL WITNESSED BY PEOPLE IN THE AREA. IT HAS BEEN IN THENATIONAL NEWS AND TAPED FOR OVER 6 DAYS NOW. EXPERTS HAVE BEEN CALLED IN BUTNOTHING HAS BEEN RELEASED BY AUTHORITIES. THE OBJECT APPEARS IN THE SKY EVERYDAY AT AROUND 5PM AND DISAPPEARS MANY HOURS LATER.THE OBJECT CHANGES SHAPEFREQUENTLY AND OMITS RAYS WHICH SEEM TO BE FLAMES THEN IT CHANGES FORM USUALLYROUND. IT ALSO SEEMS TO STAY IDLE FOR HOURS THEN INSTANTLY CHANGESDIRECTION.THANKYOU FOR LISTENING.
Summary: UFO sighting in Greece on the island of Crete.
